channel.title: How to start playing?
channel.description: i havnt played this game in a long time, and i am now getting back to it, and forgot where the download client is for it. anyone mind linking and or telling me how to get started?

item.title: How to start playing?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“rulerguy, post:3, topic:520410”]idk lets hope it works, i clicked on the link. i am trying to get to so i can type in the server address and ip. everytime i click on the 2nd 'here" and it wants me to download some codex thing. for movies and stuff etc… /:[/quote]I HIGHLY don’t suggest downloading online codecs… it sounds like an advertisement.

Read full topic
